definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
If three walk together, one of them can teach me sth (Confucius)
pinyin: san1 ren2 xing2 , ze2 bi4 you3 wo3 shi1

definition: lit. if three walk together, one can be my teacher (idiom, from the Analects of Confucius)/you have sth to learn from everyone
pinyin: san1 ren2 xing2 , bi4 you3 wo3 shi1

sentences.english: This is a drama about the balance of love among three persons.
sentences.chinese: 這是一部關於愛情平衡，關於三人行的戲劇。

sentences.english: Confucius said “If three men are walking together, one of them is bound to be good enough to be my teacher.”
sentences.chinese: 孔子曰“三人行，則必有我師。”

sentences.english: Do you dream of a threesome?
Jim`s favorite show growing up was Three`s Company.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆最喜歡的節目是《三人行》。

sentences.english: Confucius said“If three men are walking together，one of them is bound to be good enough to be my teacher.”A
sentences.chinese: 孔子曰“三人行，則必有我師。”

sentences.english: Ménage gave me great idea for the climax of the movie.
sentences.chinese: 三人行給了我完成影片高潮的靈感。

sentences.english: I visit there must be three divisions.

definition: a single man and a single woman/bachelors/a man and a woman together (typically in a secluded setting)
fig. the man sings and the woman follows/fig. marital harmony
to share vile habits/partners in notoriety/birds of a feather
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
to join up with sb/to become partner/to take meals regularly in cafeteria
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
pretense that turns into reality (idiom); to play at make-believe, but accidentally make it true
